1.title: Momentum
1.plot: Choi 'bomber' ji sung goes up against fellow pro-gamer and rising star lee 'life' seung hyun, who shares his goal of a starcraft ii world championship series title. Only one can come out on top, but does bomber have the edge in experience?

2.title: Elimination
2.plot: On the road to blizzcon, choi 'bomber' ji sung and lee 'life' seung hyun step in for the round of 16, a single-elimination tournament. Both need to win, but face tough opponents. Nerves, lights, and cameras: will they both advance to the next round?

3.title: Power
3.plot: Choi 'bomber' ji sung and lee 'life' seung hyun lead intense, pro-gamer existences filled with tournaments, training, travel and more training. Even with similarities in their practice routines, both players have very different play-styles.

4.title: Transition
4.plot: As bomber faces mandatory military service in south korea, others reflect on his legacy, and bomber speaks about what it means to end his pro gaming career and why he still fights on in the starcraft ii scene.

5.title: The big show
5.plot: Bomber and life make it to blizzcon, where the pressure's on in the first round with intense matches. Bomber is on a roll, but can he actually make it through to the finals and take a world championship? Can life vanquish a series of tough opponents?

6.title: New beginnings
6.plot: A career in pro gaming can be an amazing, joyous ride, despite all the hard work and sacrifices required to make it to the top. Bomber's fate is unfortunately sealed but life still has a chance to be the starcraft ii global champion.

imdb.title: One final run
plot: With two years of compulsory Korean military service forcing him into retirement, StarCraft II pro gamer Choi 'Bomber' Ji Sung is on a quest for 2014 World Championship Series glory. But he's not the only one with that dream.
